author: Giedrė
title: Handmade Crystal-Studded Crowns Are An Actual Thing
text: Handmade Crystal-Studded Crowns Are An Actual Thing 1k+ views Ever wanted to look like royalty, but can’t find that prince or princess? Don’t worry, because California-based designer Melissa Loschy, has got it covered with her range of hand-crafted crystal-decorated crowns. Show Full Text Drawing on history, nature, and countries she has been inspired by, Melissa’s crowns became a thing by somewhat of an accident. They started as accessory pieces for photoshoots, which slowly turned into stunning, high-quality, crystal-finished tiaras. Melissa decorates her crowns by manipulating images, and printing them on water-resistant paper. She then combines different fabrics, and embroidery techniques to finish the piece to add a sense of personality and quality to her handiwork.
